name: Aaron
description: I received a stubby version that was not the same as the item that was pictured. Mine were also not flat on the end as other reviewers have noted and seem rather cheaply made.

name: SunSalty
description: he #3 Allen stripped. Very little pressure, first time used ... I purchased because it said Made in USA and expected reliability...

name: Tom
description: I'm a Machine/Tool Builder in automotive. My last set of Eklind Hex keys out lasted the plastic sheath. They started slipping out of the sheath after 10 years of heavy use.

name: F. Brock
description: These are made in USA Allen wrenches that are a durable, high quality product. I use them on my job frequently.

name: Carl
description: I've been using this set daily for about 8 months now, as a mechanic, and haven't had any issues with them. The keys are very good quality, and the case is quite small and doesn't take up much room in a tool box.

name: Aaron
description: I received a stubby version that was not the same as the item that was pictured. Mine were also not flat on the end as other reviewers have noted and seem rather cheaply made.

name: Frank N. Stein
description: MADE IN AMERICA!!!!! Very hard steel keeps it's form under stress. That each plastic holder is a different color makes it easy to grab the right pack. (Metric or British). .
